customer_reviews.title: You Need This
customer_reviews.text: I'm over 60 and somehow never really heard of an alum block before (or never paid attention to it). This is almost a game changer. It's a natural antiseptic and will stop small weepers. It glides over the face slickly and if an area stings then you'll know to take it easier there next time. It's part of my shaving routine now. This is a good deal and arrived perfect. It'll last forever but I'll buy another one here when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Knick stop and skin tone... Old School
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and have yet to use it. I have used styptic pencils before, though. The only thing I really dislike about styptic pencils is the white residue left behind. I am looking forward to trying this out, as I have intentionally started shaving with a safety razor. Why? I got tired of the price, and the manufacturer mentality that has landed us at the place of "More Blades, the More Better!".. My beard is coarse enough to clog a razor about halfway through a full stroke... so, yeah, that logic doesn't work out too well for me. This is why I am returning to low-tech, more masculine shaving, the old school way.

product_meta.title: Alum Block, Soothing Aftershave Alum Rock with Hard Plastic Container, 100 grams of Alum Bar – B.I.G. Beard Balm
product_meta.description:
B.I.G. stands for “being incredible gentlemen.” This represents the heart and soul of our company. Our brand intends to help men become better men by inspiring them to take better care of themselves. We offer some of the best men’s grooming products on the market. Each is crafted to help enhance your appearance while you maintain your unique, individual style.

Our alum block is your new must-have for grooming. Don’t shave without this! It delivers numerous benefits for your skin. To achieve your most neat, smoothest shave, we also recommend using the B.I.G. Pre-Shave Oil. Make this and our post-shave alum block an essential in your shaving routine. Together, these make the perfect pair to help you get the most flawless shave!

This product comes with a “Shaving Guide” ebook to give you more pointers for getting healthier facial skin despite constant shaving. We want to inspire men to experience success in every aspect of their lives. So, we hope that this textbook companion contributes to that success!

Directions for use:

Moisten block with cold water. Gently rub over the shaved area. Allow it to settle on skin and dry for a few seconds. Rinse and pat dry. Rest block in its container and store in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: COMBATS POST-SHAVING SKIN CONCERNS – It soothes razor bumps, burn, and redness. It keeps irritation and inflammation from developing on your facial skin.
STOPS BLEEDING CAUSED BY SMALL CUTS – While nicks and cuts may not be avoided at times when shaving, you can effectively inhibit bleeding with our Alum Bar. It also helps heal the skin faster.
CLEANSES THE SKIN – Our Alum Rock also helps clear the skin of blemishes over time with consistent use. It rids your skin of bacteria, too, which can be a source of irritation or development of acne.
TIGHTENS PORES – Constant use of Alum Block helps tighten pores. It makes them much less visible so you get clearer and healthier skin.

HARD PLASTIC CONTAINER KEEPS ALUM BLOCK INTACT – This product can last to serve you through multiple numbers of usage. Store the alum bar every after use in its container to preserve and keep it from breaking.
